__TOC__

This page has been set up in preparation for mouz' application for the Ubuntu Bug Control team. It summarizes some examples of bug work done. The standard launchpad query for bugs related to mouz: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/~mouz|here]]</nowiki>.

''Update 15th Aug 2008: my application for the Ubuntu Bug Control team (http://lists.launchpad.net/ubuntu-bugcontrol/msg00049.html) was successful. This page is and will keep being out-of-date in some minor aspects. I will not remove it as it might be useful for others wanting to apply.''
